senses.sense_definition: Частица, употребляемая при передаче чужой речи или мыслей для указания на то, что они принадлежат не говорящему (соответствует по значению словам «мол», «дескать»).

examples.text: Он оправдывался тем, что не знал правил, и никто-<w>де</w> его не предупредил.

target_lang_translations.en: He made excuses saying he didn't know the rules and that <w>allegedly</w> no one had warned him.

examples.text: Соседка заявила, что очень занята и времени-<w>де</w> у неё совсем нет.

target_lang_translations.en: The neighbor stated that she was very busy and that she <w>supposedly</w> had absolutely no time.

target_lang_definitions.en: A particle used to indicate that the statement is reported speech or someone else's opinion, showing that the speaker is merely conveying what was said or thought by another.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: indicating that something is claimed to be the case
used to show that the information comes from someone else
phrase used to attribute a statement to another person
